settings.meta_desc: I am a Web developer from Kathmandu, Nepal. I make things that live on web, and my moto is customer statisfaction. I am available as freelancer

home.title: Abiral
home.work: I MAKE THINGS that live on Web

profile.introduction:
Hello, I am a passionate web developer who loves to make websites that 'function' & 'sparkle' located in Kathmandu, Nepal.

I, as an experienced developer believe, every system being created should solve the problem that aroused before. So, as a follower of Agile Methodology of Software Engineering, I prefer communication as much as possible to make sure what I am building suits your requirement.

Thus, Your Satisfaction goes on the top of my priority list.
profile.name: Abiral Neupane

sites.title: Namaste Nepal

sites.description: Namaste Nepal is specially meant for someone who is unknown about Nepal's history, custom and traditions, and so on and so forth. Anyone can request for a blog composition, and they can share their experience, knowledge and thoughts through the site.

coursewares.title: Fast Track on WordPress
coursewares.excerpt: A book outline for WordPress beginners
coursewares.description: This courseware was designed to help those people who want to learn WordPress, but do not know where to get started and what's next. I have added all the relevant links as I don't want my readers to bound within my knowledege. So, follow the book outline, I am sure, you can master WordPress

plugins.title: Idle User Logout
plugins.excerpt: A plugin that kicks out Idle User from the site after some specific time
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically logs out the user after a period of idle time.

If the user has been inactive for too long, then the user is automatically logged out and redirected to login page.

It tracks the users activity in both the front end and admin end.

quotes: I would rather lose myself in my passion than lose my passion
